prompt_base: raw photo, middle-aged man, overweight, balding with side hair, distinct beard stubble area, white polo shirt, blue pants, expressive eyes
feature_prompt: hyper-realistic skin pores, unshaven facial hair texture, cotton fabric texture, soft studio lighting, 8k uhd, sharp focus, fujifilm xt3, bokeh
negative_prompt: yellow skin, cartoon, anime, drawing, illustration, 3d render, plastic, doll, smooth skin, lowres, blurry, distorted eyes
